TopicTitle: How to transfer fuel between tanks when they're hidden?

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

Yeah, so I've designed an interplanetary ship, much like in NASA's Constellation mission.

Although it looks pretty, it's functionality is, as of now, rather poor. By this, I mean that the RCS tanks are placed within a permanent fairing (Procedural Fairings) and can't be clicked. In the included screenshot, the mentioned area is arrowed. Does anyone know of a method of transferring fuel without having the ability to click both tanks?
Umm, clip the camera into the fairing and then click it? If that's not possible then I have no idea... (other than just break open the spacecraft:D)
